name: lubowa-morph-registration-minifier
description: Minification tools for Lubowa Morph Registration

scripts.minify:js: terser src/scripts/scripts.js --compress --mangle --output scripts.min.js && terser src/scripts/admin.js --compress --mangle --output admin.min.js && terser config/config.js --compress --mangle --output config.min.js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss src/styles/styles.css --output styles.min.css && cleancss src/styles/admin-styles.css --output admin-styles.min.css
scripts.build: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html
